data.title: 250 families declare support of Mujahideen in Ghor
data.meta_description: Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan(IEA), Исламский Эмират Афганистан, Emirato Islámico de Afganistán, 阿富汗伊斯兰酋长国, Afganistan İslam Emirliği.
data.meta_site_name: Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, Исламский Эмират Афганистан.
data.text:
GHOR, Jun. 26 – Reports arriving from Dawlina district of Ghor province state that, residents of Poy and Kenean areas have announced their support with Mujahideen of Islamic Emirate under the leadership of commander Sahhi Dad early this morning, handing over 30 rifles, 2 PK machine guns, 1 RPG launcher and other equipment.

This comes after commander Sarwar along with its 50 gunmen and 500 families have joined Mujahideen in Zarqan area yesterday, handing over many arms and ammunition to Mujahideen.
